channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investors should brace for more trade-war volatility as ‘high-stakes game of chicken’ between U.S. and China begins

item.title: Tesla made a gamble with its latest price cuts. Will it pay off?
item.description: The new ‘standard’ Tesla models might not be priced low enough for consumers to justify the tradeoffs, one expert says.

item.title: Papa John’s stock rallies, as report adds to takeover speculation
item.description: Shares of pizza chain Papa John’s rallied on Monday, following the latest report that it could become a takeover target, as the restaurant industry st...

item.title: It’s too good to be true — but you may not believe it. How to listen when investment pros say ‘back off.’
item.description: Losing $150,000 in crypto, being convinced of easy money in real estate, and other dangers from unrealistic expectations.

item.title: My real-estate agent wants me to spend $8,000 on a new driveway. Will that really help sell my house?
item.description: Regardless of which renovations you choose to make, don’t expect them to rapidly reduce how much time your home spends on the market.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
